name: Valorant
description: Valorant is a tactical first-person shooter game developed by Riot Games. Players take on the roles of agents, each with unique abilities, in a 5v5 competitive format where strategic gameplay is key.

2022.achievement: Flawless Victory at the Spring Valorant Cup (2022) - Team A

2023.achievement: Champion of the Regional Valorant Showdown (2023) - Team A
MVP of the Season (2023) - Team B
Top 4 Finish in the International Valorant Championship (2023) - Team C

2024.achievement: Best Defensive Team Award (2024) - Team A

name: League of Legends
description: League of Legends (LoL) is a multiplayer online battle arena game where teams of champions compete to destroy the opposing team's Nexus. Players select from a roster of characters with different roles, abilities, and strategies.

2022.achievement: Flawless Victory at the Summer League of Legends Cup (2022) - Team A

2023.achievement: Champion of the Regional League of Legends Championship (2023) - Team A
Top 5 Finish in the International League of Legends Championship (2023) - Team B

2024.achievement: MVP of the Season (2024) - Team B
Best Defensive Team Award (2024) - Team A

name: Call of Duty
description: Call of Duty (CoD) is a popular first-person shooter franchise known for its intense combat scenarios, story-driven campaigns, and competitive multiplayer modes.

2022.achievement: Flawless Victory at the Summer League Call of Duty Season 2 (2022) - Team C

2023.achievement: Champion of the Regional Call of Duty Championship (2023) - Team A
Top 3 Finish in the International Call of Duty Championship (2023) - Team B

2024.achievement: MVP of the Season (2024) - Team B
Best Defensive Team Award (2024) - Team A

name: Dota 2
description: Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena game where two teams of five players compete to destroy each other's Ancient, a large structure within their base. It features a diverse pool of heroes with unique abilities.

2022.achievement: Flawless Victory at the Summer Dota 2 Season 12 (2022) - Team A
Top 3 Finish in the International 11 (2022) - Team B

2023.achievement: Champion of the Regional Dota 2 Championship (2023) - Team A

2024.achievement: MVP of the Season (2024) - Team B
Best Defensive Team Award (2024) - Team A

name: Fortnite
description: Fortnite is a battle royale game where players compete to be the last person or team standing on a constantly shrinking map. It includes building mechanics, where players can construct structures to gain advantages during gameplay.

2022.achievement: Flawless Victory at the Winter Fortnite Championship (2022) - Team C
Top 5 Finish in the Regional Fortnite Championship (2022) - Team B

2023.achievement: Champion of the Regional Fortnite Championship (2023) - Team A

2024.achievement: MVP of the Season (2024) - Team B
Best Defensive Team Award (2024) - Team A
